name: cacheRemove
description: Removes an object from the cache.

params.name: id
params.description: Comma delimited list of cache IDs. A list of all available IDs can be retrieved using cacheGetAllIds. CF11+ Can take an array instead of a list.

params.name: throwOnError
params.description: When `true` throws an error when cache ID does not exist.

params.name: region
params.description: CF10+ Specify which cache region to search

params.name: exact
params.description: CF10+ When `true`, matches values in `id` exactly

examples.title: Remove one ID using exact match
Example using exact=false
Example using exact=true
examples.description: With exact set to true, no IDs match, so none will be deleted

examples.title: Remove all cached data using default settings
examples.code:
<cfset allCacheIDs = cacheGetAllIds( ) />
<cfif not arrayIsEmpty( allCacheIDs )>
  <cfset cacheRemove( allCacheIDs ) />
</cfif>
